name: The Imperial Theatre, Goes Up in Flames
Even If My Time to Dream Has Passed/Machine of Dreams

description: The Power division honors their fallen. While Wolfe experiences what it's like to me powerless and Royalle schemes.
name: The Raconteur of the Funeral Circuit

deck: A flashback to Coulson and May's ill-fated mission to Bahrain.
description:
In 2008 May and Coulson go to Bahrain to recruit a powered individual named Eva Belyahkov. It quickly spirals out of control into a hostage situation.

While in the present May discovers that Coulson has been conducting a secret project called 'Theta Protocol'.

At Afterlife, Gordon tries to help Raina, while Jiaying works with Skye. Skye also learns (but doesn't realize the connection to May) of the history of Eva and her daughter, two Inhumans that disobeyed the rules and how their history is why Jiaying and Skye must keep their relationship secret.
name: Melinda

deck: A long-lost relative of Steven's comes to town to aid him in unlocking the power of his mother's gem.
name: Say Uncle

description:
Japanese title: Unare Chidori, Hoero Sasuke! (唸れ千鳥 吠えろサスケ!)

Intent on confronting Itachi, Sasuke rushes to the town where Naruto is staying. On the way, tragic memories of his past come flooding back.
name: Roar, Chidori! Brother vs. Brother!

description:
Japanese title: Orokanaru otōto yo urame, nikume! (愚かなる弟よ 恨め, 憎め!)

Jiraiya saves Naruto from Kisame just in time. It turns out that Itachi and the Akatsuki organization are definitely after Naruto to obtain the power of the Nine-Tailed Fox.
name: Hate Among the Uchihas: The Last of the Clan!

description:
Japanese title: Shugyō kaishi, Ore wa zettē tsuyoku naru! (修行開始 オレはぜってー強くなる!)

Deeply hurt mentally and physically, Sasuke is taken back to the Hidden Leaf Village by Guy. If only the medical specialist Tsunade were there...
name: A New Training Begins: I Will Be Strong!

description:
Japanese title: Konjō!!! Warero mizufūsen (根性!!!割れろ水風船)

Naruto finally begins his training with Jiraiya. The technique Naruto will learn was the trademark of the Fourth Hokage, a technique which even a genius like him took three years to master.
name: Keep on Training: Pop Goes the Water Balloon!

description:
Japanese title: Konoha māku to hitaiate (木ノ葉マークと額当て)

Naruto manages to complete the first step of his training. But the next step, making a rubber ball explode with chakra, proves extremely difficult.
name: Focal Point: The Mark of the Leaf

description:
Japanese title: Hamon (波紋)

Orochimaru and Kabuto suddenly appear before Tsunade and Shizune who are out sightseeing. Orochimaru, injured by the Third Hokage's Reaper Death Seal, seeks the former Sannin's medical expertise.
name: An Impossible Choice: The Pain Within Tsunade's Heart

description:
Japanese title: Ikari bakuhatsu! Yurusanēttebayo (怒りバクハツ!許さねーってばよ)

In exchange for healing his arms, Orochimaru offers to bring back to life Tsunade's younger brother Nawaki and Dan, her sweetheart.
name: Unforgivable! A Total Lack of Respect!

description:
Japanese title: Shodai Hokage no isan Shi o yobu kubikazari (初代火影の遺産 死を呼ぶ首飾り)

Naruto is incensed at the way Tsunade disrespects the position of Hokage and challenges her to a fight.
name: Inheritance! The Necklace of Death!

description:
Japanese title: YES ka NO ka! Tsunade no kaitō (YESかNOか!ツナデの回答)

Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimaru's offer.
name: A Dubious Offer! Tsunade's Choice

description:
Japanese title: Kōshō Ketsuretsu! (交渉決裂!!)

Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimaru's tempting offer.
name: Breakdown! The Deal is Off!

description:
Japanese title: Kurae! Ikari no Rasengan (くらえ!怒りの螺旋丸)

Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.
name: Attack! Fury of the Rasengan!

description:
Japanese title: Godaime Hokage, Inochi o kaketa tatakai! (五代目火影 命を賭けた戦い)

Naruto's ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
name: The Fifth Hokage! A Life on the Line!

description:
Japanese title: Sansukumi no tatakai (三すくみの戦い)

Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
name: Deadlock! Sannin Showdown!

description:
Japanese title: Naruto no yukemuri chindōchū (ナルトの湯けむり珍道中)

Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
name: Kidnapped! Naruto's Hot Spring Adventure!

description:
Japanese title: Ninja o yamero! Tsunade no tsūkoku (忍者を辞めろ!ツナデの通告)

Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than of that of a shinobi.
name: Tsunade's Warning: Ninja No More!

description:
Japanese title: Hi no ishi o tsugu mono (火の意志を継ぐもの)

Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
name: The Will of Fire Still Burns

description:
Japanese title: Nekketsu shitei no kizuna ~Otoko ga nindō o tsuranuku toki~ (熱血師弟の絆〜男が忍道を貫くとき〜)

After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy. Unable to master either ninjutsu or genjutsu, Lee has always been looked down upon by the others.
name: Sensei and Student: The Bond of the Shinobi

description:
Japanese title: Mitai, Shiritai, Tashikametai Kakashi-sensei no sugao (見たい, 知りたい, 確かめたい カカシ先生の素顔)

Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
name: Gotta See! Gotta Know! Kakashi Sensei's True Face!

description:
Japanese title: Iza shin ninmu Giri to ninjō to Chakoku o sukue! (いざ新任務 義理と人情と茶国を救え!)

Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are sent on a B-rank mission to the neighboring Land of Tea. They are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
name: Mission: Help an Old Friend in the Land of Tea!

series.name: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic

description:
Japanese title: Naruto gekichin!? Inbau uzumaku ōunabara (ナルト撃沈!?陰謀うずまく大海原)

The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
name: The Race is On! Trouble on the High Seas!

description:
Japanese title: Hashire Idate! Arashi o yubi haran no Nagitō!! (走れイダテ!嵐を呼ぶ波乱のナギ島!!)

Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
name: Run Idate Run! Nagi Island Awaits!

description:
Japanese title: Gōru chokuzen! Raimei todoroku daigekitō (ゴール直前!雷鳴とどろく大激闘)

Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and it's revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idate's older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
name: A Fierce Battle of Rolling Thunder!

description:
Japanese title: Todoku ka Idate! Shūnen no rasuto supāto!! (届くかイダテ!執念のラストスパート!!)

Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
name: The Last Leg: A Final Act of Desperation

description:
Japanese title: Omae to tatakaitai! Tsuini gekitotsu Sasuke tai Naruto (オマエと戦いたい!ついに激突 サスケVSナルト)

Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
name: The Battle Begins: Naruto Vs. Sasuke

description:
Japanese title: Mienai kiretsu (見えない亀裂)

Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
name: Bitter Rivals and Broken Bonds

description:
Japanese title: Oto no izanai (音の誘い)

The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru...
name: An Invitation from the Sound

description:
Japanese title: Kessei! Teppeki fōmēshon (結成!鉄壁のフォーメーション)

Sakura's pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
name: Formation! The Sasuke Retrieval Squad!

description:
Japanese title: Sesshoku ~Oto Yoninshū no jitsuryoku~ (接触〜音四人衆の実力〜)

The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimaru's lair with Sasuke in hand. They're discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido...
name: Sound Vs. Leaf

description:
Japanese title: Ikinari nakamaware!? Shikamaru shōtai daipinchi (イキナリ仲間割れ!?シカマル小隊大ピンチ)

Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobo's Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
name: Squad Mutiny: Everything Falls Apart!

description:
Japanese title: Pawā zenkai! Moero Chōji (パワー全開!燃えろチョウジ)

After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
name: Full Throttle Power! Choji, Ablaze!

description:
Japanese title: Saraba tomo yo...! Soredemo ore wa shinjiteru (さらば友よ...!それでもオレは信じてる)

After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
name: Good-bye Old Friend! I'll Always Believe in You!

description:
Japanese title: Omae no aite wa kono ore da! (お前の相手はこのオレだ!)

Assuming that the Leaf Squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja don't bother to lay traps along the way.
name: Your Opponent is Me!

description:
Japanese title: Shikai sanbyaku-rokujū do, Byakugan no shikaku (視界360度 白眼の死角)

Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
name: 360 Degrees of Vision: The Byakugan's Blind Spot!

description:
Japanese title: Makerarenai riyū (負けられない理由)

Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Neji's blind spot.
name: Losing is Not an Option!

description:
Japanese title: Dakkan ~ Ma ni awanakatta utsuwa (奪還〜間に合わなかった器)

Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
name: The Vessel Arrives Too Late

description:
Japanese title: Shissaku! Aratanaru teki (失策!新たなる敵)

Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
name: Miscalculation: A New Enemy Appears!

description:
Japanese title: Unare! Hoero! Kyūkyoku no taggu (唸れ!吠えろ!究極のタッグ)

Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
name: Roar and Howl! the Ultimate Tag-Team!

description:
Japanese title: Sorezore no tatakai (それぞれの闘い)

Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kiba’s body and tries to merge with his cells.
name: To Each His Own Battle

description:
Japanese title: Feiku! Otoko Shikamaru kishikaisei no kake (フェイク!男シカマル起死回生の賭け)

An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro…
name: Fakeout: Shikamaru’s Comeback!

description:
Japanese title: Konoha no aoki yajū kenzan! (木ノ葉の碧き野獣見参!)

Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
name: The Leaf’s Handsome Devil!

description:
Japanese title:Yajū sakuretsu! Hajikero futtobe tsukinukero! (野獣炸裂!弾けろ吹っ飛べ突き抜けろ!)

With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
name: The Beast Within

description:
Japanese title: Konoha dōmeikoku Suna no shinobi (木ノ葉同盟国砂の忍)

Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
name: The Sand Shinobi: Allies of the Leaf

description:
Japanese title: Saikyō taiketsu! Gaara tai Kimimaro!! (最強対決!我愛羅VS君麻呂!!)

Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaara’s wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.
name: Showdown: Gaara vs Kimimaro!

description:
Japanese title: Shūnen no ichigeki Sawarabi no Mai (執念の一撃!早蕨の舞)

Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaara’s protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke…
name: Vengeful Strike! the Bracken Dance!

description:
Japanese title: Todokanai sakebi (届かない叫び)

With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
name: A Cry On Deaf Ears

description:
Japanese title: Itachi to Sasuke tōsugiru sonzai (兄と弟 遠すぎる存在)

Naruto tries desperately to change Sasuke’s mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
name: Brothers: Distance Among the Uchiha

description:
Japanese title: Chichi to ko Hibiwareta kamon (父と子 ひび割れた家紋)

Naruto is brought down by Sasuke’s Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu. It is a jutsu passed down through generations of the Uchiha family…
name: Father and Son, the Broken Crest

description:
Japanese title: Kaigan Mangekyō Sharingan no himitsu (開眼 万華鏡写輪眼の秘密)

Sasuke quietly watches as Naruto sinks deeper in the water. He recalls the past, when the Uchiha clan was cruelly slaughtered.
name: The Secrets of the Mangekyo Sharingan!

description:
Japanese title: Tomo yo! (親友よ!)

Kakashi uses his Summoning Jutsu and sends ninja dogs to track Naruto and Sasuke. With his newfound strength, Sasuke is serious about bringing down Naruto...
name: For a Friend

description:
Japanese title: Namida no hōkō! Omae wa ore no tomodachi da (涙の咆哮!オマエはオレの友達だ)

Naruto releases his Nine-Tail chakra and sends Sasuke flying. Sasuke counters with his Fire Style Jutsu, but Naruto extinguishes the flames easily.
name: A Plea From a Friend

description:
Japanese title: Namida ame no ketsumatsu (涙雨の結末)

Naruto's Nine-Tail chakra seems to move with a will of its own as it counters Sasuke's powerful attacks.
name: The End of Tears

description:
Japanese title: Mamorenakatta yakusoku (守れなかった約束)

The fierce battle with Sasuke leaves Naruto unconscious. Kakashi finally arrives at his side.
name: The Promise That Could Not Be Kept

description:
Japanese title: Sennyū sōsa!? Tsui ni kitakita chō-Esu-kyū ninmu (潜入捜査!? 遂にきたきた超S級任務)

Sakura tries to sneak out of the village to find Sasuke, but Naruto intercepts her.
name: Deep Cover?! a Super S-Rank Mission

description:
Japanese title: Muhōmano no machi Fūma ichizoku no kage (無法者の街 ふうま一族の影)

Naruto, Sakura and Jiraiya search for information in a town in the Land of Rice Paddies.
name: A Town of Outlaws! the Shadow of the Fuma Clan

description:
Japanese title: Kiyoki uragiri Hakanaki negai (清き裏切り はかなき願い)

Naruto, Sakura and Sasame are attacked by Kamikiri, Jigumo and Kagero of the Fuma Clan.
name: Pure Betrayal, and a Fleeting Plea!

description:
Japanese title: Kyōfu! Orochimaru no yakata (恐怖!大蛇丸の館)

Jiraiya uses his Summoning Jutsu to call out Gamakichi. With Gamakichi leading the way, the shinobi advance up winding stairways and through long tunnels.
name: Pure Terror! the House of Orochimaru

description:
Japanese title: Futatsu no kodō Kabuto no wana (二つの鼓動 カブトの罠)

Sakura is cornered by Orochimaru! Just as Kabuto is about to hurl his kunai at her, Naruto comes running in.
name: Two Heartbeats: Kabuto's Trap

description:
Japanese title: Sakura no ketsui (サクラの決意)

Naruto tries to shield Sakura from an attack and is wounded by Kamikiri. Naruto laughs off his injury and counters with his Shadow Clone Jutsu…
name: Sakura's Determination!

description:
Japanese title: Genkai shisetsu no san akunin (厳戒施設の三悪人)

Naruto gets upset when Jiraiya sets out on a sudden mission without him. Jiraiya tells him to undergo special training during his absence and hands him a scroll.
name: The Three Villains from the Maximum Security Prison

description:
Japanese title: Hashire Tonton! Omae no hana ga tayori dattebayo (走れトントン!お前の鼻が頼りだってばよ)

Shizune pursues Mizuki who has escaped from the Maximum Security Prison, but is overcome by him and the brothers Raijin and Fujin.
name: Tonton! I'm Counting On You!

description:
Japanese title: Shin'sei surīman seru futari to ippiki (新生三人一組 二人と一匹!)

Raijin and Fujin possess superhuman strength, and Naruto is no match for them.
name: A New Squad! Two People and a Dog?!

description:
Japanese title: Sakuretsu! Nyū fōmēshon Inoshikachō (炸裂!ニューフォーメーションいのシカチョウ)

Shikamaru, Ino and Choji come to the rescue.
name: A New Formation: Ino-Shika-Cho!

description:
Japanese title: Nokosareta yabō Orochimaru no kage (残された野望 大蛇丸の影)

Naruto discovers that Tsubaki is Mizuki's fiancee. She has an idea of his whereabouts and asks the squad to take her with them.
name: Orochimaru's Shadow!

description:
Japanese title: Innen no taiketsu! Omae ni ore wa taosenee (因縁の対決!オマエにオレは倒せねえ)

Naruto and Iruka are left in a daze by the power of Mizuki's chakra. Naruto counters with a jutsu but is quickly rebuffed.
name: A Clash of Fate: You Can't Bring Me Down!

description:
Japanese title: Chō-tsuibiryoku ni Akamaru mo shitto! Maboroshi no Bikōchū o sagase (超追尾力に赤丸も嫉妬!幻の微香虫を探せ)

Kiba, Shino and Hinata have come up with an idea to use the Bikochu beetle to find Sasuke.
name: The Search for the Rare Bikochu Beetle

description:
Japanese title: Doko ga chigau no sa!? Mushi tte onaji mienai ka (どこが違うのさ!? 虫って同じに見えないか)

Squad 8 and Naruto arrive at the Bikochu's habitat. They use a photograph to guide them in their search...
name: What's the Difference? Don't All Insects Look Alike?

description:
Japanese title: Damashite bakashite damasarete! Sōzetsu mushimushi dai batoru (だまして化かしてだまされて! 壮絶ムシムシ大バトル)

Hinata is kidnapped by Suzumebachi and others from the Kamizuru Clan.
name: A Battle of Bugs! The Deceivers and the Deceived!

description:
Japanese title: Moe yo Byakugan! Kore ga watashi no nindō yo (燃えよ白眼! これが私の忍道よ)

Naruto, Kiba and Shino are pursued and find themselves cornered in the hive of a queen bee.
name: Blaze Away, Byakugan! This Is My Ninja Way!!

description:
Japanese title: Sei aru mono e no sōsōkyoku (生あるものへの葬送曲)

While training in the Hidden Leaf Village, Naruto rescues three men from the rapids who have come to request a mission.
name: Funeral March for the Living

description:
Japanese title: Kokoro no todoke! Ai no Tekken (心に届け!愛の鉄拳)

The Kurosuki gang captures Rokusuke, and Raiga tells him that he will hold a funeral for him!
name: A Lesson Learned! The Iron Fist of Love!

description:
Japanese title: Byakugan no tenteki (白眼の天敵)

Raiga and Ranmaru use their Hidden Mist jutsu to conceal themselves in Katabami Gold Mine, where even Neji's Byakugan cannot detect them.
name: The Enemy of the Byakugan

description:
Japanese title: Shinobi yoru anun (忍び寄る暗雲)

The Kurosuki Family is dispersed, and peace returns to Katabami Gold Mine.
name: The Dark Creeping Clouds

description:
Japanese title: Gyakushū no Raiga (逆襲の雷牙)

Raiga comes back to life, only to see Ranmaru lying deathly still on the ground.
name: Raiga's Counterattack

description:
Japanese title: Hashire!!! Seimei no karē (走れ!!!生命のカレー)

Despite his injuries, Lee keeps on fighting desperately. But the tornado that envelopes Raiga's attack takes the form of a dragon, and Lee is swallowed up by it.
name: Run! The Curry of Life!

description:
Japanese title: Minna ore ni tsuite koi! Ase to namida no takurami dai sabaibaru (みんなオレについて来い!汗と涙のタクラミ大サバイバル)

Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami...
name: Follow My Lead! The Great Survival Challenge!

description:
Japanese title: Teki ka mikata ka!? Kōya no shōkinkasegi (敵か味方か!?荒野の賞金稼ぎ)

Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
name: The Bounty Hunter from the Wilderness

description:
Japanese title: Eru ka erareru ka!? Okkē tera no kettō (獲るか獲られるか!?オッケー寺の決斗)

Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
name: Hunt or Be Hunted?! Showdown at the O.K. Temple

description:
Japanese title: Sankyaku kenzan Ao no Yajū? Mōjū?... Sanjū? (珍客見参 碧の野獣?猛獣?...珍獣?)

While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
name: The Appearance of Strange Visitors

description:
Japanese title: Shiroki noroi musha (白き呪いの武者)

The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
name: The Cursed Warrior

description:
Japanese title: Sakushi - Kōmei no omowaku (策士·紅明の思惑)

Moso, the late feudal lord's counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot�
name: The Tactician's Intent

description:
Japanese title: Ososugita suketto (遅すぎた助っ人)

Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu is summoned to investigate...
name: Too Late for Help

description:
Japanese title: Naruto shisu (ナルト死す)

Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
name: The Death of Naruto

description:
Japanese title: Todomatta mama no jikan (止まったままの時間)

Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
name: When Time Stands Still

description:
Japanese title: Shirasagi no habataku jikan (白鷺のはばたく時間)

At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
name: When Egrets Flap Their Wings

description:
Japanese title: Moero Zundō! Mazete nobashite yude agero! (燃えろ寸胴!混ぜて伸ばして茹で上げろ!)

Choji and Naruto is craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
name: Mix it! Stretch It! Boil It! Burn Copper! Burn!

description:
Japanese title: Kioku Ushinawareta peiji (記憶 失われた頁)

The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting with Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
name: Remembrance: The Lost Page

description:
Japanese title: Shōgeki Tozasareta doa (衝撃 閉ざされた扉)

Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
name: The Closed Door

description:
Japanese title: Sen'nyū Shikumareta torappu (潜入 仕組まれた罠)

As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearences and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
name: Infiltration: The Set-Up!!

description:
Japanese title: Zetsubō Hikisakareta hāto (絶望 引き裂かれた心)

Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
name: Despair: A Fractured Heart

description:
Japanese title: Kaisen Tokihanatareta pawā (海戦 解き放たれた力)

The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
name: Battle at Sea: The Power Unleashed!!
